name: Instructions: Condensed Resin
desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making Condensed Resin. Using resin in this condensed form to activate certain Ley Line Blossoms and Petrified Trees will increase your efficiency. You can hold no more than 5 Condensed Resin at a time.

customize.name: Instructions: Condensed Resin
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making Condensed Resin. Using resin in this condensed form to activate certain Ley Line Blossoms and Petrified Trees will increase your efficiency. You can hold no more than 5 Condensed Resin at a time.

customize.name: Condensed Resin
customize.desc:
You can hold no more than 5 at a time.
Condensed tree resin that can be used instead of Original Resin to revitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms to receive greater rewards.
Crystal filled with immense energy.
The silver-white Irminsul trees and blossoms are connected to ley lines that have become blocked over time. The energy contained in tree resin can purify the obstructing substance.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Crystal Core
customize.desc: The core of a crystal butterfly. It absorbs elemental energy that has escaped into the atmosphere.

customize.name: Original Resin
customize.desc: It is said that the roots of all the Irminsul trees and blossoms in the world are intertwined at the deepest, most hidden place in the earth, and that the pattern the root system makes defines the Ley Lines of the world.

value.name: Condensed Resin
